column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I live very close to baba reba and we love it! It is great in the summer because you can sit on the patio. It's important to make a reservation because the wait is always long-especially on the weekends. However
column2: if you call ahead the day of and something opens
column3: they are willing to take you. I love the food. You really cannot go wrong
column4: but some specials to note are the spicy potatoes
